title: Your tax credits go down or stop

details.description: Reasons why your tax credits go down or stop and what you can do about it
details.body:
Your payments may go down or stop if your circumstances change or your details change.

Your payments may have gone down or stopped because:

  • your award notice shows you have been overpaid
  • you haven’t renewed your tax credits claim
  • your income is too high for Working Tax Credit or Child Tax Credit
  • your income has gone up by more than Â£10,000
  • payments for having a baby under the age of 1 stopped on 6 April 2011

They can also change if you don’t tell the Tax Credit Office:

  • that your child is 16 and staying in education or training
  • you’ve changed your bank, building society or Post Office account
  • you’ve changed address

What to do

Report changes to your work or family life to the Tax Credit Office because these changes affect how much money you get.

Tax Credit Helpline
Telephone: 0345 300 3900
Textphone: 0345 300 3909
